mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO i4fvb_batch_evacuation (id, name, creater, createdDeptId, owner, ownerDeptId, createdTime, modifier, modifiedTime, workflowInstanceId, sequenceNo, sequenceStatus, ownerDeptQueryCode, unique_num, employee_name, identityNo_type, identityNo, pay_foreign_company, pay_person, separation_costs, separation_costs_months, order_end_date, social_security_end_time, provident_fund_end_time, w_service_fee_end_date, social_security_stop_reason, remark, end_employment_agreement, employee_internal_num, employee_nature) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.creater}, #{item.createdDeptId}, #{item.owner},#{item.ownerDeptId}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.modifiedTime},#{item.workflowInstanceId}, #{item.sequenceNo}, #{item.sequenceStatus}, #{item.ownerDeptQueryCode}, #{item.uniqueNum}, #{item.employeeName}, #{item.identityNoType}, #{item.identityNo}, #{item.payForeignCompany}, #{item.payPerson}, #{item.separationCosts}, #{item.separationCostsMonths}, #{item.orderEndDate}, #{item.socialSecurityEndTime}, #{item.providentFundEndTime}, #{item.wServiceFeeEndDate}, #{item.socialSecurityStopReason}, #{item.remark}, #{item.endEmploymentAgreement}, #{item.employeeInternalNum}, #{item.employeeNature})
